analyzed: de nas gang dga' ba'i tshal chen po na snga na 'khod pa'i lha de dag dang / gang brgya byin dang lhan cig lha ma yin gyi g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams /
translated: Then, in the Great Pleasure Grove, the gods who were already there and those who had won the battle against the asuras together with Śakra, all endowed with the five sense pleasures,

original: dbyar zla ba bzhir bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ngo //
analyzed: dbyar zla ba bzhir bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ngo //
translated: experience incomparable bliss for four months of summer.

original: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor /
analyzed: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor /
translated: Śakra, king of the gods, is surrounded by hosts of gods and goddesses.

original: de dag kyang lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas /🔽dga' bar byed /
analyzed: de dag kyang lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas / dga' bar byed /
translated: They, too, surrounded by hosts of gods and goddesses,🔽enjoy themselves.

original: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
translated: They make love.

original: bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ba na; skabs der ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //

analyzed: der yang skye bo @227a *//

translated: “Next, the monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects will consider the karmic actions and their ripening in the case of Airāvaṇa, the king of elephants.🔽What kind of karmic action made him so powerful and endowed with miraculous abilities?

analyzed: khrid par byed kyang mi mthong ngo; ;skad cig tu ni dge byed cing //
translated: In an instant, it acts virtuously;

original: skad cig tu ni mi dge byed //
analyzed: skad cig tu ni mi dge byed //
translated: in an instant, it acts nonvirtuously.

original: dge dang mi dge byed pa yi //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge byed pa yi //
translated: The mind that acts virtuously and nonvirtuously

original: sems dul ba ni bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sems dul ba ni bde bar 'gyur //
translated: will be happy when it is disciplined.

original: sgo drug nas ni byung ba yis //
analyzed: sgo drug nas ni byung ba yis //
translated: From the six sense doors

original: yul rnams la ni rab tu brkam //
analyzed: yul rnams la ni rab tu brkam //
translated: it hungrily devours the objects.

original: 'jig rten mthar ni sems khrid pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten mthar ni sems khrid pa //
translated: The mind leads to the end of the world🔽and is not seen to go anywhere.

original: nyon mongs yang dag mi rig go /🔽de ltar dge slong des legs par byas pa chen po de chung dur  bsgyur ba mthong @229b nas; yid la legs par byas zhes bya ba'i las gang gis phal lam /
analyzed: nyon mongs yang dag mi rig go / de ltar dge slong des legs par byas pa chen po de chung dur  bsgyur ba mthong @229b nas; yid la legs par byas zhes bya ba'i las gang gis phal lam /
translated: Afflictions are not truly understood.🔽“ ‘In this way, the monk sees how great positive actions can be reduced to something small.

original: lha gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: lha gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: He thinks, “What is the karma of positive action that leads to becoming a god or another being?

original: 'di ltar de sems gtso bo'i dbang dang / sems yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang gis dud 'gror grub pa lta zhes brjod do //🔽de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
analyzed: 'di ltar de sems gtso bo'i dbang dang / sems yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang gis dud 'gror grub pa lta zhes brjod do // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
translated: In this way, it is the mind that is primary, and it is due to the mind’s transformation that one becomes an animal.”

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
translated: “ ‘Next, the monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects will examine the realm of the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sa rnam mdzes na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //🔽der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sa rnam mdzes na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
translated: With knowledge derived from hearing he will then correctly perceive a realm of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three known as Beautiful Ground.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
translated: Wondering what karmic actions may cause beings to be born there, he will examine this matter with knowledge derived from hearing.

original: gang bdag nyid tshul khrims bsrungs shing /
analyzed: gang bdag nyid tshul khrims bsrungs shing /
translated: He will then notice how some people may observe discipline themselves,

original: gzhan yang bsrung bcug /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsrung bcug /
translated: Moreover, they cause others to observe it.

original: bdag nyid sdig pa mi byed cing /
analyzed: bdag nyid sdig pa mi byed cing /
translated: They themselves do not commit misdeeds

original: gzhan yang zlog par byed /
analyzed: gzhan yang zlog par byed /
translated: and cause others to desist from them.

original: skyon du bgrang bar byed la /
analyzed: skyon du bgrang bar byed la /
translated: They count them as faults

original: tshul khrims la'ang rab tu bkod /
analyzed: tshul khrims la'ang rab tu bkod /
translated: and establish others in ethical discipline.

original: de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dri ma med pa brtan pa dang / nyer bsdogs yongs su dag pa srung bar byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dri ma med pa brtan pa dang / nyer bsdogs yongs su dag pa srung bar byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin te /
translated: They themselves observe pure ethical discipline, the steadfast, pure, preparatory training, and they abandon taking life and taking what is not given.

original: srog gcod rnam pa du spangs zhe na /
analyzed: srog gcod rnam pa du spangs zhe na /
translated: How do they abandon taking life?🔽Here they do not dig the ground where many sentient beings live,

original: 'dir sdom pas bsdams pas sems can mang po dang / grog spur mang po dang / sdig pa mang po dang / sbal ba mang po dang / srog chags gnas na gnas pa mang po dang / ne'u le mang po gnas pa'i sa brkos pa gang gis /🔽sems can gnod par 'gyur ba rko bar @230a *//
analyzed: 'dir sdom pas bsdams pas sems can mang po dang / grog spur mang po dang / sdig pa mang po dang / sbal ba mang po dang / srog chags gnas na gnas pa mang po dang / ne'u le mang po gnas pa'i sa brkos pa gang gis / sems can gnod par 'gyur ba rko bar @230a *//
translated: where many ants live, where many worms live, where many snakes live, where many insects live, or where many other living beings live.🔽They do not dig the ground where they think

original: mi byed la /
analyzed: mi byed la /
translated: sentient beings will be harmed.

original: gzhan sdom pa blangs pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan sdom pa blangs pa'am /
translated: They cause others who have taken vows

original: sdom pa ma blangs pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
analyzed: sdom pa ma blangs pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
translated: and those who have not taken vows to desist from taking life.

original: skyon du bgrang bar byed /
analyzed: skyon du bgrang bar byed /
translated: He counts them as faults.

original: 'gog par byed /
analyzed: 'gog par byed /
translated: He stops them.

original: 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: He makes them confess.

original: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar 'dzin ce na /🔽'di la rdza mkhan nam /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar 'dzin ce na / 'di la rdza mkhan nam /
translated: How does he observe the moral discipline of abandoning taking what is not given?🔽In this regard, he does not take even the smallest thing with a thieving mind from a potter

original: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la rku sems kyis cung zad tsam yang mi len pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la rku sems kyis cung zad tsam yang mi len pa /
translated: or from something else that is owned by someone else.

original: gzhan len na'ang phyir zlog par byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan len na'ang phyir zlog par byed cing /
translated: If others take it, he makes them give it back.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa yin te /
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa yin te /
translated: He establishes them in moral discipline and does not rejoice in it.

original: de ltar srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa rnam par spangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims spyod pa de /
analyzed: de ltar srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa rnam par spangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims spyod pa de /
translated: Thus, that holy person who practices moral discipline, having abandoned killing and taking what is not given,

original: lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rnam par mdzes na gnas pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro; ;rtag tu dga' zhing glu dbyangs dang / bgad pa dang / rtses pa dang / rab tu rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyod pa skye bo rang gi 'od dang ldan pas rtag tu gang ba'i tshal dang /
analyzed: lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rnam par mdzes na gnas pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro; ;rtag tu dga' zhing glu dbyangs dang / bgad pa dang / rtses pa dang / rab tu rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyod pa skye bo rang gi 'od dang ldan pas rtag tu gang ba'i tshal dang /
translated: When they later separate from their bodies, they will go to the joyful higher realms and be born in the world of the gods in the realm of Beautiful to Behold.

original: nye ba'i tshal dang / skyed mos tshal gyi gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nye ba'i tshal dang / skyed mos tshal gyi gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will be born in forests, parks, and gardens that are always filled with joyful beings who are endowed with their own light and who sing, laugh, play, enjoy themselves, and indulge in pleasures.

original: tshul khrims bzang po bsrung ba mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //🔽las bya ba legs par byas pa de'i yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i 'byor ba'i 'di yin te /
analyzed: tshul khrims bzang po bsrung ba mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro // las bya ba legs par byas pa de'i yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i 'byor ba'i 'di yin te /
translated: “ ‘Those who observe excellent discipline will be born in the higher realms.🔽This is the result of having engaged in excellent actions.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The following are the features of the land that they will enjoy:

original: tshal de kun nas gser gyi dra ba'i skud pas nye bar sbrel zhing dril bu g-yer @230b kha'i sgra si li li 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshal de kun nas gser gyi dra ba'i skud pas nye bar sbrel zhing dril bu g-yer @230b kha'i sgra si li li 'byung ngo //
translated: “ ‘The forests are connected by golden threads and adorned with tinkling bells.

original: de la dril bu g-yer kha'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin te /
analyzed: de la dril bu g-yer kha'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin te /
translated: The form of the small bells is as follows.🔽

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “The forms of the bells and small bells are as follows.

original: gang las kyis byas pa'i bee d'urya'i dril bu g-yer kha rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas /
analyzed: gang las kyis byas pa'i bee d'urya'i dril bu g-yer kha rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas /
translated: When they see from afar a bell or small bell made of beryl by the work of karma,

original: 'di ltar las bya ba legs par byas pa zhi ba khyod byon pa lta zhes smra zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar las bya ba legs par byas pa zhi ba khyod byon pa lta zhes smra zhing /
translated: they say, ‘Welcome, you who are peaceful and have done good actions.’

original: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
translated: They speak in verse:

original: yid ni shin tu dang ba yis //🔽tshul khrims dag ni gang bsrungs pa //
analyzed: yid ni shin tu dang ba yis // tshul khrims dag ni gang bsrungs pa //
translated: “ ‘With a very clear mind,🔽whatever pure discipline you have guarded,

original: de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa yi //
analyzed: de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa yi //
translated: that guarded discipline

original: bde ba 'dir ni nye bar gnas //
analyzed: bde ba 'dir ni nye bar gnas //
translated: is present here as happiness.🔽The happiness of complete transformation🔽and the realization of nirvāṇa🔽come from well-guarded discipline

original: tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang // goms pa du ma byas pa yi //🔽yongs su 'gyur ba bde ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur //🔽tshul khrims ngan 'gro rnams las skyob //
analyzed: tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang // goms pa du ma byas pa yi // yongs su 'gyur ba bde ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur // tshul khrims ngan 'gro rnams las skyob //
translated: and from doing many familiarizations.🔽Discipline protects from the lower realms;

original: tshul khrims bzang 'gror khrid par byed //
analyzed: tshul khrims bzang 'gror khrid par byed //
translated: discipline leads to good rebirths.

original: de ltar tshul khrims rtag tu bsrungs //
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims rtag tu bsrungs //
translated: Thus, always guard your discipline.

original: yongs su 'gyur ba'i bsil ba yin //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba'i bsil ba yin //
translated: The coolness of the transformation of virtue.

original: 'chi dus yang dag 'byung ba'i tshe //
analyzed: 'chi dus yang dag 'byung ba'i tshe //
translated: When the time of death arrives,

original: tshul ldan ga las 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: tshul ldan ga las 'jigs pa med //
translated: How can the moral be afraid?

original: ngan 'gro las skyob bdag las med //
analyzed: ngan 'gro las skyob bdag las med //
translated: There is no other protection from the lower realms

original: tshul khrims skyob pa mchog yin no //🔽de ni khyod de tshul chen gyis //
analyzed: tshul khrims skyob pa mchog yin no // de ni khyod de tshul chen gyis //
translated: Than the supreme protection of moral discipline.🔽You have been protected by that great morality

original: thams cad du ni bsrungs pa yin //🔽lha yi gnas su 'ongs pa dag /
analyzed: thams cad du ni bsrungs pa yin // lha yi gnas su 'ongs pa dag /
translated: Everywhere.🔽Do not be so careless

original: shin tu bag med ma byed cig /
analyzed: shin tu bag med ma byed cig /
translated: In the divine abodes to which you have come.

original: de ltar lha de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra des bag med pa'i nyes pa rnams khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar lha de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra des bag med pa'i nyes pa rnams khong du chud par byed do //
translated: In this way, the gods, through their virtuous karma, understand the faults of carelessness through the sound of the ringing bells.

original: de nas gang lha yun ring bar tshul khrims bsrungs pa de /🔽legs par khong du chud nas skad cig tsam du'ang shin tu bag @231a *//
analyzed: de nas gang lha yun ring bar tshul khrims bsrungs pa de / legs par khong du chud nas skad cig tsam du'ang shin tu bag @231a *//
translated: Then, those who have long observed moral discipline

original: med pa mi byed do //
analyzed: med pa mi byed do //
translated: Understand this, and for just a moment they do not act with extreme carelessness.

original: gang gis tshe rabs mang po shin tu goms pa med pa de ni de'i tshe sgra rnam par 'byin pa yi khong du mi chud par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang gis tshe rabs mang po shin tu goms pa med pa de ni de'i tshe sgra rnam par 'byin pa yi khong du mi chud par 'gyur la /
translated: Those who have not become accustomed to this over many lifetimes do not understand the sound at that time.

original: de ltar de phyir zhing shin tu bag med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de ltar de phyir zhing shin tu bag med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: Thus, they become even more careless.

original: de ltar de yang dag par khong du chud nas /
analyzed: de ltar de yang dag par khong du chud nas /
translated: Having understood this,

original: de nas yang gzhan du 'gro bar byed de /
analyzed: de nas yang gzhan du 'gro bar byed de /
translated: they then go elsewhere.

original: tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i gnas rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i gnas rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
translated: They go to the place of the forest and park that is adorned with the seven precious substances.

original: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'ang kun nas dpag tshad sum stong yod pas bzhi po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'ang kun nas dpag tshad sum stong yod pas bzhi po 'di dag ste /
translated: The forest of Beauty is three thousand leagues in size.

original: tshal chen po'i sa gzhi dang / grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba thams cad che ba yin la /
analyzed: tshal chen po'i sa gzhi dang / grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba thams cad che ba yin la /
translated: The ground of the great forest and the great city called Beautiful to Behold are all of great size.

original: sa lhag ma gzhan dag ni chung ba yin no //
analyzed: sa lhag ma gzhan dag ni chung ba yin no //
translated: The remaining grounds are smaller.

original: tshal de'ang kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te /
analyzed: tshal de'ang kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te /
translated: The forest is square.

original: tshal de'i ngos bzhi la bee d'urya shin tu dri ma med pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po bzhi yod de /
analyzed: tshal de'i ngos bzhi la bee d'urya shin tu dri ma med pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po bzhi yod de /
translated: In the four directions of the forest there are four great wish-fulfilling trees of stainless beryl.

original: shing dag de dag gi 'od rgyar kun nas dpag tshad tsam la /
analyzed: shing dag de dag gi 'od rgyar kun nas dpag tshad tsam la /
translated: The light of those trees extends one league in all directions.

original: ring du'ang dpag tshad lnga stong du 'byung ste /
analyzed: ring du'ang dpag tshad lnga stong du 'byung ste /
translated: It is five thousand leagues in height and five hundred leagues in circumference.

original: shing de dag gi 'od nyi ma bzhin du snang ngo //
analyzed: shing de dag gi 'od nyi ma bzhin du snang ngo //
translated: The light of those trees shines like the sun.

original: shing de dag gi yal ga dang / lo ma rnams la lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs lhan cig rtse bar byed cing yid la gang dang / gang 'dod pa de de dag las 'thob bo //
analyzed: shing de dag gi yal ga dang / lo ma rnams la lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs lhan cig rtse bar byed cing yid la gang dang / gang 'dod pa de de dag las 'thob bo //
translated: The gods and goddesses play together in the branches and leaves of those trees, and whatever they desire comes from those trees.

original: shing de dag gi dbus na /
analyzed: shing de dag gi dbus na /
translated: In the middle of those trees

original: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de kun nas gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya'i padma'i rdzing rnams @231b kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
analyzed: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de kun nas gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya'i padma'i rdzing rnams @231b kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
translated: is the forest of Nandana, which is beautified by golden, silver, and beryl lotus ponds.

original: gser btso ma dri ma med pa'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
analyzed: gser btso ma dri ma med pa'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
translated: It is beautified by trees of pure, refined gold.

original: kun nas zhing ma rmos pa chen po shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu ro zhim pa dang / brtson 'grus chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas /
analyzed: kun nas zhing ma rmos pa chen po shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu ro zhim pa dang / brtson 'grus chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas /
translated: It is beautified by a great, unploughed field that is very pure, very clean, very sweet-tasting, and very vigorous.

original: bya dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu mthong na yid du 'thad pa /
analyzed: bya dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu mthong na yid du 'thad pa /
translated: There are white birds that are like stainless snow mountains and are pleasing to behold.

original: thos na nyams dga' ba sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so //
analyzed: thos na nyams dga' ba sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so //
translated: It was beautified by the presence of birds whose songs were delightful to hear.

original: tshal de na gang bya dngul gyi sgro yod pa de dag gi mgo gser la /
analyzed: tshal de na gang bya dngul gyi sgro yod pa de dag gi mgo gser la /
translated: In that forest, the birds with silver feathers had heads of gold,

original: lto ba bee d'urya /
analyzed: lto ba bee d'urya /
translated: bellies of beryl,

original: mchu ke ke ru /
analyzed: mchu ke ke ru /
translated: beaks of coral,

original: mig padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu yin te /
analyzed: mig padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu yin te /
translated: and eyes the color of rubies.

original: de ltar bya thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dbye'o //🔽gang shing rnams kyi kha dog dngul lta bu de dag gi steng na gser gyi bya rnams gnas /
analyzed: de ltar bya thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dbye'o // gang shing rnams kyi kha dog dngul lta bu de dag gi steng na gser gyi bya rnams gnas /
translated: Thus, the colors of all the birds were distinct.🔽The golden birds perched on the silver trees,

original: gang gser gyi shing ljon pa de dag la dngul gyi bya rnams gnas /🔽gang bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga'i gsab gseb na bya padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu gnas /
analyzed: gang gser gyi shing ljon pa de dag la dngul gyi bya rnams gnas / gang bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga'i gsab gseb na bya padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu gnas /
translated: the silver birds on the golden trees,🔽the birds the color of beryl in the branches of the beryl trees,

original: gang shing ljon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu de dag la bya mthon ka'i kha dog lta bu rgyu ste /
analyzed: gang shing ljon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu de dag la bya mthon ka'i kha dog lta bu rgyu ste /
translated: and the birds the color of rubies in the branches of the ruby trees.

original: 'bras bu thams cad la za zhing sbrang rtsi dag la'ang 'thung ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu thams cad la za zhing sbrang rtsi dag la'ang 'thung ngo //
translated: They ate the fruits of all the trees and drank the honey.

original: gang kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams la rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro bkra ba'i bya de dag kyang rtse bar byed /
analyzed: gang kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams la rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro bkra ba'i bya de dag kyang rtse bar byed /
translated: On the trees of the seven precious substances, birds with colorful plumage of the seven precious substances play.

original: skad 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: skad 'byin par byed do //
translated: The birds on the trees of the seven precious substances play and sing on the colorful saddles of the seven precious substances.

original: de ltar bung ba'i tshogs kyang padma mang po rnams kyi nang na /
analyzed: de ltar bung ba'i tshogs kyang padma mang po rnams kyi nang na /
translated: In the same way, the bees

original: las sna tshogs byas pa /
analyzed: las sna tshogs byas pa /
translated: perform various actions🔽within the many lotuses.

original: lus bkra ba /
analyzed: lus bkra ba /
translated: Their bodies are colorful,

original: dus kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yod @232a *//
analyzed: dus kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yod @232a *//
translated: and they have various thoughts about the time.

original: pa; padma'i gseb tu zhugs shing ze ba'i gseb gseb na gnas pa rnams dga' bar byed /
analyzed: pa; padma'i gseb tu zhugs shing ze ba'i gseb gseb na gnas pa rnams dga' bar byed /
translated: Entering the lotus flowers, they enjoy themselves

original: phan tshun rtse bar byed /
analyzed: phan tshun rtse bar byed /
translated: and play with each other

original: yongs su spyod par byed do //🔽de ltar shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i grib ma yon tan kun 'byor ba'i steng na /
analyzed: yongs su spyod par byed do // de ltar shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i grib ma yon tan kun 'byor ba'i steng na /
translated: within the anthers.🔽In this way, the gods and their retinues of goddesses enjoy themselves

original: lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed /🔽yongs su spyod par byed do //
analyzed: lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed / yongs su spyod par byed do //
translated: and frolic in the shade of the trees, which are endowed with all good qualities.

original: tshal de'ang lha thams cad kyi yon tan kun shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshal de'ang lha thams cad kyi yon tan kun shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
translated: This forest is endowed with all the qualities of the gods.

original: gang gi tshe lha rnams lha ma yin rnams dang g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lha rnams lha ma yin rnams dang g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the gods and demigods go to war,

original: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di ltar lha rnams sta gon gyis shig /
analyzed: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di ltar lha rnams sta gon gyis shig /
translated: Śakra, king of the gods, will say to the gods, “Gods, prepare yourselves!

original: ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'di dag lha rnams la mngon par gnod pa byed kyi /
analyzed: ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'di dag lha rnams la mngon par gnod pa byed kyi /
translated: The demigods who live on Mount Candra are attacking the gods.

original: chos shig ces bsgo'o //
analyzed: chos shig ces bsgo'o //
translated: Fight them!”

original: de thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
analyzed: de thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
translated: Hearing this, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three will go to the forest of Delight and,

original: lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba dag rnams mdzes kyi tshul du 'jug go /
analyzed: lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba dag rnams mdzes kyi tshul du 'jug go /
